content.question: Which of the following is an accurate description of the executive in Nigeria?

choices.label: The Nigerian president has no power over the military.
The Nigerian president chooses the prime minister.
The Nigerian president is the head of state and conducts foreign policy.
The Nigerian president does not interact with the legislature.

content.answer: The Nigerian president is the head of state and conducts foreign policy.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
